org.eclipse.incquery.tooling.core.project

Class ProjectGenerationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.incquery.tooling.core.project.ProjectGenerationHelper

  • public abstract class ProjectGenerationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A common helper class for generating IncQuery-related projects.
    Author:
    Zoltan Ujhelyi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> SINGLESOURCEFOLDER
      A single source folder named src
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> SOURCEFOLDERS
      Two source folders: src to be manually written and src-gen to contain generated code

                                     throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Checks whether the project depends on a selected bundle ID
        Parameters:
        project - an existing, open plug-in project to check
        dependency - bundle identifier
        Returns:
        true, if the project depends on the given bundle

      • ensureExtensions

        public static void ensureExtensions(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                    java.lang.Iterable<org.eclipse.pde.core.plugin.IPluginExtension> contributedExtensions,
                    java.lang.Iterable<org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> removedExtensions)
                             throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Updates the selected project to contain the selected extension. The extensions are identified using an identifier and extension point together; old extensions are replaced with the new ones, other extensions are kept intact.
        Parameters:
        project -
        contributedExtensions -
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

      • ensureExtensions

        public static void ensureExtensions(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                    java.lang.Iterable<org.eclipse.pde.core.plugin.IPluginExtension> contributedExtensions,
                    java.lang.Iterable<org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> removedExtensions,
                    org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                             throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Updates the selected project to contain the selected extension. The extensions are identified using an identifier and extension point together; old extensions are replaced with the new ones, other extensions are kept intact. An extension will be ignored, if exist in the removedExtensions list.
        Parameters:
        project - an existing, open PDE plug-in project
        contributedExtensions -
        removedExtensions -
        monitor -
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

      • removeAllExtension

        public static void removeAllExtension(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                      java.util.Collection<org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> removableExtensionIdentifiers)
                               throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Removes all extensions from the project, if the extension's pointId equals to one of the given pointId.
        Parameters:
        project - an existing, open PDE project
        removableExtensionIdentifiers - - contains both the extension id prefix (key), and the extension point id (value)
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
